description:
React component that renders an image with support
for fallbacks

onLoad.description: A callback for when the image `src` has been loaded
onLoad.name: onLoad

onError.description: A callback for when there was an error loading the image `src`
onError.name: onError

ignoreFallback.description: If `true`, opt out of the `fallbackSrc` logic and use as `img`
ignoreFallback.name: ignoreFallback

crossOrigin.description:
The key used to set the crossOrigin on the HTMLImageElement into which the image will be loaded.
This tells the browser to request cross-origin access when trying to download the image data.
crossOrigin.name: crossOrigin

fallbackSrc.description:
Fallback image `src` to show if image is loading or image fails.

Note ðŸš¨: We recommend you use a local image
fallbackSrc.name: fallbackSrc

fallback.description: Fallback element to show if image is loading or image fails.
fallback.name: fallback

fit.description:
How the image to fit within its bounds.
It maps to css `object-fit` property.
fit.name: fit

align.description:
How to align the image within its bounds.
It maps to css `object-position` property.
align.name: align

htmlWidth.description: The native HTML `width` attribute to the passed to the `img`
htmlWidth.name: htmlWidth

htmlHeight.description: The native HTML `height` attribute to the passed to the `img`
htmlHeight.name: htmlHeight
